reviews.review_msg:
Amazing effort into lectures, I feel bad for Cristina, she tried to make the class as engaging as possible, but 105 is just a dull class, anyway, she's also very generous and forgiving.
don't focus on the material you write, just focus on following the rubric, thats where the bulk of the marks are

She's a good prof but the CMPT 105W course sucks. I skipped like 5 weeks worth of lectures and missed nothing. The written reports can be a little tricky, make sure you follow guidelines properly and do your citations properly.

Loved the grading scheme as it was very forgiving. She was a nice prof, but I unfortunately did not find much value from the lectures. Prof and TAs were responsive for questions regarding the assignments. Rubric and what to be expected are clearly laid out, was fairly graded as well. Definitely recommend her for a course like 105w.

Good class if you're ok at writing in general. Assignment marks just have random marks taken off by TAs. Lectures can be boring mainly due to course material but Christina is a good prof. Only con is assignments are due before past assignments are marked so sometimes you can make the same mistake in both assignments
Great prof, it's just that the course itself isn't that fun but besides that if u can yap in English u r good to go especially since TAs r more lenient than highschool teachers!

Super nice and great prof, it's just the content of the course which makes it very boring. I only attended like 2-3 lectures because of this. As long as you participate with the discussions on canvas and do well on essays, basically a free A.

Alright prof, found the course to be boring but most bc of the material and not how it was taught. Grading can depend on if it's a TA or not but the prof herself is very generous. She moved around deadlines sometimes which was nice
Extremely easy course. Don't bother showing up to lectures, they're useless.

Would recommend to avoid if you can. Lectures are incredibly boring. She just reads words from the slides, and says nothing important. You will be asked to finish the next part of the assignment before you are given feedback on the last part, and will be penalized for the same mistakes. If you must take her class, lectures are a waste of time.

Class was very boring in general and professor did not have a lot of energy either which made the lectures worse. Assignments are graded weirdly. Lectures felt very useless as well since she doesn't teach and just goes through slides on her powerpoint without really saying anything important.
Good prof very understanding changed lots of deadlines she is pretty good not going to lie
